languages.text: "О! Как вы суровы и беспощадны! Неужели вы можете убить человека из одной только ревности? А двух или трех?.. Как страшны Вольные Торговцы, мое сердце трепещет. И какое счастье, что вам не придется проливать кровь невинных, ведомых любовью — ведь ни один из них не вправе претендовать на меня. Все они изнывают от страсти на почтительном расстоянии, угрызаясь и проклиная свою жестокую судьбу".

"Oh! You ruthless, cruel creature! Would you really kill a person purely out of jealousy? Or two or three people? Rogue Traders are a fearsome breed — my heart trembles to witness it. How fortunate, then, that you will not have to spill the blood of any lovesick innocent — for none has any rightful claim on me. They all languish in their passion at a respectful distance, mourning and cursing their cruel fate."
languages.original_text: "О! Как вы суровы и беспощадны! Неужели вы можете убить человека из одной только ревности? А двух или трех?.. Как страшны Вольные Торговцы, мое сердце трепещет. И какое счастье, что вам не придется проливать кровь невинных, ведомых любовью — ведь ни один из них не вправе претендовать на меня. languages.text: «¡Oh! ¡Ser cruel y despiadado! ¿De verdad mataría a alguien solo por celos? ¿O incluso a dos o tres personas? Los Comerciantes Independientes son una casta temible... mi corazón se estremece al pensar en ello. Por suerte, no tendrá que derramar la sangre de ningún inocente enamorado, pues no hay nadie con derecho a mi corazón. Todos languidecen, prisioneros de la pasión, a una distancia respetuosa, lamentando y maldiciendo su cruel destino».
languages.original_text: "Oh! You ruthless, cruel creature! Would you really kill a person purely out of jealousy? Or two or three people? Rogue Traders are a fearsome breed — my heart trembles to witness it. How fortunate, then, that you will not have to spill the blood of any lovesick innocent — for none has any rightful claim on me. They all languish in their passion at a respectful distance, mourning and cursing their cruel fate."

Todos languidecen, prisioneros de la pasión, a una distancia respetuosa, lamentando y maldiciendo su cruel destino».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢！你这冷酷无情的家伙！你真的打算仅仅因为嫉妒，就夺走另一个人的生命吗？甚至要杀两三个人？行商浪人可真是可怕的物种，光是看到这一切，我的心就在颤抖。不过幸运的是，你不必让任何痴情的无辜者流血，因为没有任何人赢得了我的芳心。他们都与我保持着一定的距离，在各自的激情中煎熬，哀悼、诅咒着他们的残酷命运。”
languages.original_text: "Oh! You ruthless, cruel creature! Would you really kill a person purely out of jealousy? Or two or three people? Rogue Traders are a fearsome breed — my heart trembles to witness it. How fortunate, then, that you will not have to spill the blood of any lovesick innocent — for none has any rightful claim on me. They all languish in their passion at a respectful distance, mourning and cursing their cruel fate."

traits.locale_text: “噢！你这冷酷无情的家伙！你真的打算仅仅因为嫉妒，就夺走另一个人的生命吗？甚至要杀两三个人？行商浪人可真是可怕的物种，光是看到这一切，我的心就在颤抖。不过幸运的是，你不必让任何痴情的无辜者流血，因为没有任何人赢得了我的芳心。他们都与我保持着一定的距离，在各自的激情中煎熬，哀悼、诅咒着他们的残酷命运。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたって無謀で残酷なのね！ほんとにその純粋な嫉妬心から人を殺せるのかしら？それも何人も？自由開拓者って恐ろしい種族なのね。俺なんか見るだけで心が震えるわ。でも、きっと幸運なこと何でしょうね。恋に病んだ無実の人たちの血を流す必要なんてないのだから。あたしはまだ誰のものでもないわ。みんなちょっと離れたところから恋焦がれてるだけ。残酷な運命を嘆き呪っているのよ」
languages.original_text: "Oh! You ruthless, cruel creature! Would you really kill a person purely out of jealousy? Or two or three people? Rogue Traders are a fearsome breed — my heart trembles to witness it. How fortunate, then, that you will not have to spill the blood of any lovesick innocent — for none has any rightful claim on me. They all languish in their passion at a respectful distance, mourning and cursing their cruel fate."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたって無謀で残酷なのね！ほんとにその純粋な嫉妬心から人を殺せるのかしら？それも何人も？自由開拓者って恐ろしい種族なのね。俺なんか見るだけで心が震えるわ。でも、きっと幸運なこと何でしょうね。恋に病んだ無実の人たちの血を流す必要なんてないのだから。あたしはまだ誰のものでもないわ。みんなちょっと離れたところから恋焦がれてるだけ。残酷な運命を嘆き呪っているのよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Oh ! Cruelle créature au cœur de pierre ! Vous seriez vraiment {mf|prêt|prête} à tuer des innocents par pure jalousie ? Les libres-marchands n'ont pas volé leur sinistre réputation, semble-t-il, et mon cœur tremble à la voir ainsi confirmée. Par chance, vous n'aurez pas à verser le sang d'un malheureux prétendant éconduit, car personne ne m'a encore fait sa demande officielle. Tous se languissent à distance respectueuse, victimes de cette passion dévorante vouée à un sort inique. »
languages.original_text: "Oh! You ruthless, cruel creature! Would you really kill a person purely out of jealousy? Or two or three people? Rogue Traders are a fearsome breed — my heart trembles to witness it. How fortunate, then, that you will not have to spill the blood of any lovesick innocent — for none has any rightful claim on me. They all languish in their passion at a respectful distance, mourning and cursing their cruel fate."

traits.locale_text: « Oh ! Cruelle créature au cœur de pierre ! Vous seriez vraiment {mf|prêt|prête} à tuer des innocents par pure jalousie ? Les libres-marchands n'ont pas volé leur sinistre réputation, semble-t-il, et mon cœur tremble à la voir ainsi confirmée. Par chance, vous n'aurez pas à verser le sang d'un malheureux prétendant éconduit, car personne ne m'a encore fait sa demande officielle. Tous se languissent à distance respectueuse, victimes de cette passion dévorante vouée à un sort inique. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oh! Ihr gnadenlose, grausame Kreatur! Würdet Ihr wirklich aus reiner Eifersucht jemanden töten? Vielleicht sogar zwei oder drei jemande? Freihändler sind wahrlich furchterregend — mein Herz erzittert bei dem Gedanken, das zu erleben. Welch ein Glück daher, dass Ihr keinen liebeskranken Unschuldigen bluten lassen müsst — denn niemand hat einen rechtmäßigen Anspruch auf mich. Sie alle suhlen sich aus respektvoller Distanz in ihrer Leidenschaft und beklagen und verfluchten ihr grausames Schicksal."
languages.original_text: "Oh! You ruthless, cruel creature! Would you really kill a person purely out of jealousy? Or two or three people? Rogue Traders are a fearsome breed — my heart trembles to witness it. How fortunate, then, that you will not have to spill the blood of any lovesick innocent — for none has any rightful claim on me. They all languish in their passion at a respectful distance, mourning and cursing their cruel fate."

languages.text: "Aa! Vahşi, acımasız insan! Sırf kıskançlıktan birini öldürür müsün gerçekten? Hatta daha fazlasını? Hür Tacirler gerçekten öyle korkunçmuş ki kalbim pıt pıt atıyor. Neyse ki masum bir âşığın kanını dökmek zorunda kalmayacağın için çok şanslıyız. Şu anda kimseciklere ait değilim. Her biri, aşk acılarını güvenli bir mesafede yaşıyor. Benden uzakta yas tutup makûs kaderlerine benden uzakta lanet ediyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Oh! You ruthless, cruel creature! Would you really kill a person purely out of jealousy? Or two or three people? Rogue Traders are a fearsome breed — my heart trembles to witness it. How fortunate, then, that you will not have to spill the blood of any lovesick innocent — for none has any rightful claim on me. They all languish in their passion at a respectful distance, mourning and cursing their cruel fate."

traits.locale_text: "Ah! Seni vahşi, acımasız yaratık! Sırf kıskançlıktan bir insanı öldürür müsün gerçekten? İki veya üç insanı veya? Hür Tacirler gerçekten de çok korkunçmuş, kalbim korkudan pıt pıt atıyor. Bu durumda masum bir âşığın kanını dökmek zorunda kalmayacağın için çok şanslıyız, kimsenin benim üzerimde meşru bir hak iddiası bulunmuyor. Her biri de aşk acılarını güvenli bir mesafede yaşıyor; benden uzakta yas tutup, makûs kaderlerine benden uzakta lanet ediyorlar."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
